desc.p: This transaction breaks down the valuation.
The number of lots applicable to this transaction.
The OCC code applicable to the contract for this transaction.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The external maturity date for the transaction.
Code representing this contract in the OCC report/limit/valuation method.
Margin rate to apply to lots involved in a qualifying time (maturity) spread.
Bump up factor to be applied to initial margin at exchange level.
The internal market price from the transaction.
This contains whether the transaction is a BUY or a SELL.
Transactions used as a part of this strategy.
The strategy link for this transaction.
The internal maturity date for this transaction.
Minimum margin amount to be taken on a single transaction. If the calculated margin amount is less than this then this amount will be charged as the margin for that particular transaction.
The external market price from the transaction.
The total calculated Initial Margin amount for all contracts.
The contract size for the transaction.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Bump up factor to be applied to initial margin of the transaction.
The calculated Initial Margin amount.
The external underlying price for this transaction.
This is the total initial margin calculated for this transaction.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The rate type of the transaction.
A valid DX.STRATEGY key.
The trading strategy that this transaction is a part of.
The contract code for this transaction.
Is this transaction a HEDGE or a TRADE.
Bump up factor applied to the maintenance margin.
The total amount to be applied against this contract before the contract bump up factor is applied.
The contract size for the transaction.
The internal underlying price for this transaction.
The internal price / Premium from the transaction.
This is the key to this DX.REVAL.DET.OCC.TIMS record.
This takes the format DX.TRANSACTION key * exchange * currency * customer
The calcualated Maintenance margin amount
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
If the transaction contract is an option this contains whether the transaction is a CALL or a PUT.
The internal strike price for this transaction.
The rate ID of the transaction.
The external strike price for this transaction.
The price / Premium from the transaction.
This field defines a percentage increase or reduction that will be applied to all margin figures calculated by this routine.
This contract breaks the detailed revaluation data down into contract by contract figures relating to initial margin.
Bump up factor to be applied at contract level.
This is the total initial margin calculated for this contract, on this exchange, in this currency for this customer/group./portfolio.
